attributes.action: get the BBC to restore the famous Iconic BBC Sport Programme Grandstand
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BBC Has decided after 48 years to scrap the iconic Sports Programme Grandstand from Saturday and Sunday.
The axing happened on the weekend of 27-28th January 2007 and we want the Prime Minister to get the BBC to restore this famous Programme back onto our screens

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
